item.title: CVE-2023-29463|2024-08-02T14:07:46.424Z -- rockwell%20automation -- pavilion8
item.description: The JMX Console within the Rockwell Automation Pavilion8 is exposed to application users and does not require authentication. If exploited, a malicious user could potentially retrieve other application usersâ€™ session data and or log users out of their session.
